about_the_game:
The Ballistic Craft Soundtrack consists of a total of 16 tracks by composer Ethan Jeffrey, including some bonus tracks not found in the game.
Soundtrack provides regular 196kbps MP3 files, as well as high-quality FLAC files.

Craft, duel and groove to Ballistic Craft's Original Soundtrack -- from hardcore battle tracks to more mellow tunes, experience the world of Ballistic Craft through its music.
detailed_description:
The Ballistic Craft Soundtrack consists of a total of 16 tracks by composer Ethan Jeffrey, including some bonus tracks not found in the game.
Soundtrack provides regular 196kbps MP3 files, as well as high-quality FLAC files.

Craft, duel and groove to Ballistic Craft's Original Soundtrack -- from hardcore battle tracks to more mellow tunes, experience the world of Ballistic Craft through its music.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Storage: 90 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 380 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Craft, duel and groove to Ballistic Craft's Original Soundtrack -- from hardcore battle tracks to more mellow tunes, experience the world of Ballistic Craft through 16 tracks of happy, dramatic, moody and upbeat gaming tunes.
